author: Cynthia Ozick
message: To want to be what one can be is purpose in life.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
title: Thought of the day

author: Winston Churchill
message: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wayne Dyer
message: Our lives are a sum total of the choices we have made.
title: Thought of the day
